content: Let me know if you need any more help or guidance. I'm always here to assist you. In the meantime, I'll just mention that I've been enjoying our conversation and learning more about your sculpting journey. It's great to see you're so passionate about it, and I'm sure you'll create something amazing with your vase design. Don't forget to take breaks and practice self-care, though - sculpting can be physically demanding, and you want to make sure you're taking care of yourself.
